item.title: Conda
item.description: 1 基本环境 1.1 检查pip python -m ensurepip python -m pip install --upgrade pip 1.2 换镜像源 conda config --add channels https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free conda config --add channels https://mirrors.
